package.name: minorderqty
package.summary: Set minimum total quantities for orders per customer group.
package.description:
By default Magento lets us set the minimum quantity allowed in the shopping cart for individual items but this extension lets you set a minimum quantity for the whole order.
This is specially useful if you have, for example, a "Wholesale" customer group and want the minimum number of items in the order for this group to be 12 no matter how many of each individual items the order has.
